import React from "react"; import error from "../../../img/error.jpg"; import clear from "../../../img/clear.png"; import styles from "./CartItem.module.css"; import { setBasketItemPlus, setBasketItemMinus, removeItems, } from "../../../redux/slices/basketSlice"; function CartItem({ name, price, amount }) { return (

{name}

{price} руб.

-

{amount}

+

); } export default CartItem;
